Song.title: The Church's One Foundation
Song.copyright: By Samuel Stone and Samuel Wesley Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: The [D]church's [G]one foun[D]da[Em7]tion{,} is [G]Jesus [A]Christ her [D]Lord She [D]is His [Bm]new cre[G]ation, by [G]water [D]and the [Asus4 A]word From [D]heaven He [D/F#]came and [G]sought [D/F#]her{,} to [Em7]be His holy [A7]bride With [D]His own [G]blood He [D]bought [Em7]her, and [G]for her [A]life He [D]died
Verse 2: E[D]lect from [G]every [D]na[Em7]tion, yet [G]one o'er [A]all the [D]earth, Her [D]charter [Bm]of sal[G]vation, one [G]Lord, one [D]faith, one [Asus4 A]birth One [D]holy [D/F#]Name she [G]bles[D/F#]ses, par[Em7]takes one holy [A7]food, And [D]to one [G]hope she [D]pres[Em7]ses, with [G]every [A]grace en[D]dued.
Verse 3: The [D]church shall [G]never [D]per[Em7]ish, her [G]dear Lord [A]to de[D]fend To [D]guide, sus[Bm]tain and [G]cherish, is [G]with her [D]to the [Asus4 A]end Though [D]there be [D/F#]those that [G]hate [D/F#]her, and [Em7]false sons in her [A7]pale A[D]gainst a [G]foe or [D]trai[Em7]tor, she [G]ever [A]shall pre[D]vail
Verse 4: Mid [D]toil and [G]tribu[D]la[Em7]tion, and [G]tumult [A]of her [D]war She [D]waits the [Bm]consum[G]mation{,} of [G]peace for[D]ever[Asus4 A]more; 'Til, [D]with the [D/F#]vision [G]glor[D/F#]ious, her [Em7]longing eyes are [A7]blessed, And [D]the great [G]Church vic[D]tor[Em7]ious, shall [G]be the [A]Church at [D]rest.
Verse 5: Yet [D]she on [G]earth hath [D]un[Em7]ion with [G]God, the [A]Three in [D]one, And [D]mystic [Bm]sweet com[G]munion{,} with [G]those whose [D]rest is [Asus4 A]won. O [D]happy [D/F#]ones and [G]ho[D/F#]ly! Lord, [Em7]give us grace that [A7]we Like [D]them, the [G]meek and [D]low[Em7]ly, on [G]high may [A]dwell with [D]thee.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the churchs one foundation is jesus christ her lord she is his new creation by water and the word from heaven he came and sought her to be his holy bride with his own blood he bought her and for her life he died verse 2 elect from every nation yet one oer all the earth her charter of salvation one lord one faith one birth one holy name she blesses partakes one holy food and to one hope she presses with every grace endued verse 3 the church shall never perish her dear lord to defend to guide sustain and cherish is with her to the end though there be those that hate her and false sons in her pale against a foe or traitor she ever shall prevail verse 4 mid toil and tribulation and tumult of her war she waits the consummation of peace forevermore til with the vision glorious her longing eyes are blessed and the great church victorious shall be the church at rest verse 5 yet she on earth hath union with god the three in one and mystic sweet communion with those whose rest is won o happy ones and holy lord give us grace that we like them the meek and lowly on high may dwell with thee
